author: CandleSmartHome.com
description: The main theme for the Candle smart home
name: Candle Theme

Background color.description: You can override the default background colors with your own. Since the text color remains white, it's recommended to choose a darker color.

Hide floorplan.description: If you nevery use it, then you might want to hide the floorplan.

Show main menu as a list.description: On mobile phones the main menu is shown as a list on the left side of the screen. If you enable this option, that style will be used on all display sizes.

Zoom.description: This allows you to make certain parts of the interface larger on attached displays. It doesn't apply to everything; for example, the logs overview and the floorplan aren't affected. It cannot be guaranteed to work correctly with all community addons.

Use zoom everywhere.description: By default the zoom feature applies only to displays attached directly to the Candle controller. It's possible to make the zoom work on every browser.

Allow pinch-to-zoom.description: If you're using a touch screen, then you may want to be able to zoom in and out using a pinch gesture. By default this is disabled to avoid accidental zooming in, which for some people can cause confusion when the menu buttons disappear from view.

Hide virtual keyboard.description: If you're using an external display, but it's not touch-sensitive, then you might want to hide the external keyboard. This means you will have to attach a real keyboard instead.

Debugging.description: Advanced. Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
